thread.title: City of Beirut, capital of Lebanon looks enchanting from space station! Thomas Pesquet shares the pic
thread.title_full: City of Beirut, capital of Lebanon looks enchanting from space station! Thomas Pesquet shares the pic

title: City of Beirut, capital of Lebanon looks enchanting from space station! Thomas Pesquet shares the pic
text:
City of Beirut, capital of Lebanon looks enchanting from space station! Thomas Pesquet shares the pic By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Wednesday, February 8, 2017 - 23:59 0 
New Delhi: French astronaut Thomas Pesquet, who is part of Expedition 50 crew aboard the International Space Station (ISS) has been showering his social media followers and space enthusiasts with the breathtaking views of the Earth. 
Thanks to him, we also get to know how beautiful our planet looks like from far above. MUST READ French astronaut Thomas Pesquet looks out at warming signs over Antarctica’s Larsen ice shelf from ISS! 
Recently, he has shared an enchanting look of the City of Beirut, the capital of Lebanon from the space station, captioned as, ''The city of #Beirut, capital of #Lebanon. After a cancelled trip that was supposed to lead me there in the past, I hope to go there one day''. 
Check out his tweet: The city of #Beirut , capital of #Lebanon . After a cancelled trip that was supposed to lead me there in the past, I hope to go there one day pic.twitter.com/sJYN0fiXoy 
— Thomas Pesquet (@Thom_astro) February 8, 2017 
First Published: Wednesday, February 8, 2017 - 23:59 More from zeenews
